items.sentence: Tom talked to himself as he watered the plants.
Tom reached into his bag and pulled out a book.
Tom realized he had forgotten to lock the door.
Tom reminded his mother to wake him up at 6:30.
Tom retired from the company when he turned 65.
Tom will give you all the information you need.
We\'re confident we\'ll be able to handle this.
Tom didn\'t drink the milk Mary poured for him.
Tom didn\'t get up as early as he usually does.
Let\'s see if I can convince Tom to do the job.
